patterns: what do you reccommend for tearing eyes?
what can i get for tearing eyes
could i get something for tearing eyes
responses:
if there is a a red bump on your eyelids, sties usually heal in 5 to 7 days. 
To relieve the pain, apply warm compresses for 10 to 15 minutes, 4 times a day and take mild pain relievers. 
If the bump grows or doesn’t go away, see a doctor. If the redness spreads or swells quickly, seek help promptly.

patterns: I have a bump in my eye
how do i mange a sty, how do i mange a sties
responses:
It is a sty. They usually heal in 5 to 7 days. 
Apply warm compresses for 10 to 15 minutes, 4 times a day to help with pain.You can take mild pain relievers.
If the bump grows or doesn’ t go away, see a doctor.If the redness spreads or swells quickly, seek help promptly.

responses:
A scratch to the eye(cornea) or small particle under the eyelid may be the cause.
 Clean or salt water can be used to rinse the eye
